item.title: Bootstrapping in Statistics : Difference between Parametric and Nonparametric Bootstrap method
item.author: chetan.prajapati@live.com (Chetan Prajapati (Statistician))
item.description: This article explains bootstrap concept as a whole and discern the fundamental difference between parametric and nonparametric bootstrap using R.

item.title: Poisson regression : Statistical models for counts and rates
item.author: chetan.prajapati@live.com (Chetan Prajapati (Statistician))
item.description: Table of Contents What is a count ? Probability distribution(s) associated with the counts Poisson distribution Negative binomial distribution Poisson Inverse Gaussian (PIG) Generalized Negative Binomial Model (GNB) Generalised Poissson Models Heterogeneous Negative Binomail model (NB-H) Exact poisson regression What is a count ?

item.title: Reshape data from wide to long or from long to wide in R
item.author: chetan.prajapati@live.com (Chetan Prajapati (Statistician))
item.description: Reshaping though frequently required in data analysis, so often it remains confusing even if you are frequent user of reshape function.
